description: Returns the details about one experiment. You must already know the experiment name. To retrieve a list of experiments in your account, use ListExperiments.

parameters.name: experiment
parameters.description: The name of the experiment that you want to see the details of.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The name or ARN of the project that contains the experiment.

nested_items.name: experiment
nested_items.description: A structure containing the configuration details of the experiment.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the experiment.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the experiment is first created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the experiment.

nested_items.name: execution
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the date and time that the experiment started and ended.

nested_items.name: endedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the experiment ended.

nested_items.name: startedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the experiment started.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the experiment was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: metricGoals
nested_items.description: An array of structures that defines the metrics used for the experiment, and whether a higher or lower value for each metric is the goal.

nested_items.name: desiredChange
nested_items.description: INCREASE means that a variation with a higher number for this metric is performing better.

nested_items.name: metricDefinition
nested_items.description: A structure that contains details about the metric.

nested_items.name: entityIdKey
nested_items.description: The entity, such as a user or session, that does an action that causes a metric value to be recorded.

nested_items.name: eventPattern
nested_items.description: The EventBridge event pattern that defines how the metric is recorded.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the metric.

nested_items.name: unitLabel
nested_items.description: The label for the units that the metric is measuring.

nested_items.name: valueKey
nested_items.description: The value that is tracked to produce the metric.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the experiment.

nested_items.name: onlineAbDefinition
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the configuration of which variation to use as the 'control' version. The 'control' version is used for comparison with other variations. This structure also specifies how much experiment traffic is allocated to each variation.

nested_items.name: controlTreatmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the variation that is the default variation that the other variations are compared to.

nested_items.name: treatmentWeights
nested_items.description: A set of key-value pairs. The keys are variation names, and the values are the portion of experiment traffic to be assigned to that variation. The traffic portion is specified in thousandths of a percent, so 20,000 for a variation would allocate 20% of the experiment traffic to that variation.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: project
nested_items.description: The name or ARN of the project that contains this experiment.

nested_items.name: randomizationSalt
nested_items.description: This value is used when Evidently assigns a particular user session to the experiment. It helps create a randomization ID to determine which variation the user session is served. This randomization ID is a combination of the entity ID and randomizationSalt.

nested_items.name: samplingRate
nested_items.description: In thousandths of a percent, the amount of the available audience that is allocated to this experiment. The available audience is the total audience minus the audience that you have allocated to overrides or current launches of this feature.

nested_items.name: analysisCompleteTime
nested_items.description: The time and date that Evidently completed the analysis of the experiment.

nested_items.name: segment
nested_items.description: The audience segment being used for the experiment, if a segment is being used.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of the experiment.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: If the experiment was stopped, this is the string that was entered by the person who stopped the experiment, to explain why it was stopped.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: treatments
nested_items.description: An array of structures that describe the configuration of each feature variation used in the experiment.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the treatment.

nested_items.name: featureVariations
nested_items.description: The feature variation used for this treatment. This is a key-value pair. The key is the feature name, and the value is the variation name.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of this treatment.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of this experiment. Currently, this value must be aws.experiment.onlineab.
